headline: Russian authorities detain suspect over St. Petersburg cafe blast

key_facts.fact: Finland is set to become a member of the alliance on Tuesday, with Finnish President Sauli Niinistö traveling to Brussels to attend an accession ceremony at NATO headquarters
(The Wall Street Journal/Reuters) Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich has filed an appeal against his arrest , according to the Russian state news agency TASS
Petersburg, Russia, will take place on Tuesday at Basmanny District Court in Moscow, according to Russian state news agency Vesti
